body:
Grizzled Wolverine has an ability that can only be activated "when a creature is assigned to block Grizzled Wolverine". AI controls Grizzled Wolverine and attacks with two other creatures. I block one of these creatures. The gamelog displays "Mini Max may (no) pay red mana. If Mini Max does, Grizzled Wolverine <effect of ability>".
I would expect that Grizzled Wolverine's ability cannot be used in this situation because it was not blocked.

Detected with version 1.48
